import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import{fetchToken}from'../components/Auth/auth';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import'../assets/styles/dashboard.css';// Import CSS file for Dashboard page
import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Dashboard=()=>{console.log("Dashboard request recieved");const[tasks,setTasks]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{const fetchTasks=async()=>{try{const token=await fetchToken();console.log('token is',token);const response=await fetch('http://localhost:3003/api/tasks',{headers:{'x-auth-token':token}});if(!response.ok){throw new Error('Failed to fetch tasks');}const data=await response.json();console.log("task data",data);setTasks(data);}catch(err){console.error('Fetch tasks error',err);}};fetchTasks();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"dashboard-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Dashboard"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/task",className:"home-link-button",children:"Create Task"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/subtask",className:"home-link-button",children:"Create Sub Task"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"tasks-table",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Tasks"}),tasks.length===0?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"No tasks available"}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("table",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("thead",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Title"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Description"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Status"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Priority"})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("tbody",{children:tasks.map(task=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:task.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:task.description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:task.status}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:task.priority})]},task._id))})]})]})]});};export default Dashboard;
